## Packages and libraries 

In order to run the project the following packages should be installed to the computer:

```{r install_packages, include=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
#default packages to run RMD
evaluate
highr
markdown
yaml
xfun
knitr
#geo
install.packages("revgeo")
dplyr

#reading external files
if(!require("readxl")){install.packages("readxl")}
if(!require("rvest")){install.packages("rvest")}

```

```{r libraries, include=FALSE, echo=TRUE}

library(readxl)
library(rvest)

```
